mapper.sql: user_code, user_name, account_code, user_sex, phone_number, user_card_id, province_code, city_code, area_code, address, staff_flg, entry_time, official_time, dimission_time, validate_flag, update_time, update_user
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (user_code, user_name, account_code, user_sex, phone_number, user_card_id, province_code, city_code, area_code, address, staff_flg, entry_time, official_time, dimission_time, validate_flag, update_time, update_user) values (#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{officialTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dimissionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_code = #{accountCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_card_id = #{userCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_flg = #{staffFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
entry_time = #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
official_time = #{officialTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dimission_time = #{dimissionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
validate_flag = #{validateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_code = #{accountCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_card_id = #{userCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_flg = #{staffFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entry_time = #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, official_time = #{officialTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dimission_time = #{dimissionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, validate_flag = #{validateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t3.user_code, t3.user_name, t3.user_sex, t3.phone_number, t3.user_card_id, t3.province_code, t3.city_code, area_code, t3.address, t3.staff_flg, t3.entry_time, t3.dimission_time, t3.validate_flag, t3.update_time, t3.update_user FROM sys_account t1 INNER JOIN sys_account_user_relation t2 ON t1.account_code = t2.account_code AND t2.validate_flag = 'Y' LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t2.user_code = t3.user_code AND t3.validate_flag = 'Y' WHERE t1.locked = '0' AND t1.account_code = #{accountCode}
